function.name: washing_getProgress
function.description: This function is used to check the progress of laundry in a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its laundry progress checked.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to have its laundry progress checked.

groupAction.description: The group action for the SmartThings device that needs to have its laundry progress checked.
